entries.arrival_phase_2: Freighter detected. Looks like it needs a little repair work.
entries.complete: Escort complete, freighter hyperspacing to Ord Mantell.
entries.panic_1: Help me Pilot! I cannot take too many shots!
entries.panic_2: Pirates! They came back for me!
entries.quest_dock_d: Use /dock to dock with the freighter. You need to get it repaired.
entries.quest_escort_d: Now that the freighter has been repaired, you need to escort it the rest of the way to the hyperspace point.
entries.recovery_success: Thank you pilot, we can hyperspace out from here.
entries.rescue_abandoned: You can't just leave us here!
entries.rescue_phase_1: Thank you for coming, they damaged our reactor and we cannot leave.
entries.rescue_phase_2: Reactor repaired, thank you for your help. Please escort us out of here.
entries.taunt_1: Where do you think you are going? Those supplies are ours!
entries.taunt_2: You foolish imbecile! You fell right into our trap.
entries.title: Rescue Nova Orion Freighter
entries.title_d: Nova Orion Industries has hired you to escort the damaged freighter back to safety.
